resource.description: Represent a set of terms and conditions for a single currency quote.

ul.li: A valid customer-quote-request MUST contain one or more customer-quote resources.

The initial customer-quote-request resource that POSTed to the service by a client application MUST contains either a positive remittance-amount attribute or a positive delivery-amount attribute but NOT both. The service will ignore any null or zero values for these attributes
Each customer-quote resource MUST reference a remittance-currency and MUST reference either a delivery-currency or a beneficiary but NOT both.
If the customer accepts a customer-quote-request the server will execute the least number of fx-transactions required to fulfil that requests related customer-quotes.
If the customer accepts a customer-quote-request that contains customer-quotes referencing a beneficiary then server will enter a payment-instruction for the delivery-amount to each such beneficiary.

attribute.name: remittance-information
attribute.comment: Message intended for the beneficiary. Limited to 35 characters.

attribute.name: status
attribute.comment: The tradeable status of this quote. This quote may only be accepted by the customer when the value of this attribute is TRADEABLE.

attribute.name: comment
attribute.comment: May contain additional info as to why this quote's status is not TRADEABLE.

attribute.name: reason-comment
attribute.comment: If a payment-reason is present additional information MAY be provided to facilitate compliance checking.

relationship.name: remittance-currency
relationship.comment: Currency the customer will remit to the domain.

relationship.name: delivery-currency
relationship.comment: Currency the domain will deliver on behalf of the customer.

relationship.name: beneficiary
relationship.comment: The bank account to which the domain will deliver currency on behalf of the customer.

relationship.name: payment-reason
relationship.comment: If beneficiary is present a reason for the resulting payment MAY be provided to facilitate compliance checking.
